name: Lazy Leslie
description:
A downloadable game for Windows

The game is about a very lazy girl named Leslie, she doesn’t have the energy to do anything. One day when her phone broke she decided to get a new one. But she doesn’t have the money to do so.

You must collect 310$ to buy a new phone before the shop closes in 5 hours when starting the game, there are tasks in the game to collect the money.

How To Play :
  • WASD to move.
  • Space - to jump
  • LiftShift - to run.
  • E - to pick or open doors.
  • L - open tasks list.
  • M - open map.
  • P  - pause the game.

Give us your feedback here
